import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CartCheckOutButton from "./CartCheckOutButton"; import CartRow from "./CartRow"; import CartContext from "./context/cart/CartContext"; import Formatter from "./Formatter"; const Cart = () => { const cartContext = useContext(CartContext); const { cart, shippingCharge, couponValue } = cartContext; return (
{cart.length < 1 ? (

Whoops!!! It looks like your cart is currently Empty.

Don't worry, we got you covered. Click on{" "} Shopping to explore our goodies

) : (
{cart.length > 0 && cart.map((item) => { return ; })}
Product Qtd Quantity Unit price Total price

Coupon Code

If you have a coupon code, please enter it in the box below

Instruction for seller

If you have some information for the seller you can leave them in the box below

Order Details

Subtotal
{Formatter.format( cart .map((item) => item.price * item.qty) .reduce( (prev, next) => parseInt(prev) + parseInt(next), 0 ) )}
Coupon 'New customer'
-{Formatter.format(couponValue)}
New Subtotal
{/* substract coupon value here */} {Formatter.format( cart .map((item) => item.price * item.qty) .reduce( (prev, next) => parseInt(prev) + parseInt(next), 0 ) - couponValue )}
Shipping Charge
{Formatter.format(shippingCharge)}
Total
{Formatter.format( cart .map((item) => item.price * item.qty) .reduce( (prev, next) => parseInt(prev) + parseInt(next), 0 ) - couponValue - shippingCharge )}
)}
); }; export default Cart;
